org.linqs.psl.database.rdbms.driver

Class MySQLDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.database.rdbms.driver.MySQLDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseDriver

    public class MySQLDriver
extends Object
implements DatabaseDriver
    MySQL Connection Wrapper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MySQLDriver(String dbname, boolean clearDB)
      Constructor for the MySQL database driver On Performance: Use the non-memory specific model, innodb as default (Note one can change to use MyISAM or Memory engine.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MySQLDriver

        public MySQLDriver(String dbname,
                   boolean clearDB)
        Constructor for the MySQL database driver On Performance: Use the non-memory specific model, innodb as default (Note one can change to use MyISAM or Memory engine. For PSL, as there's no transactions, Innodb may be an overhead however the indexes availability should be taken into consideration, for simplicity, use default innodb here.) On Configuration: Use the localhost, user root and no pwd for now One potentially can connect to mysql clusters, or use other user/pwd.
        Parameters:
        dbname - mysql database name, similiar to H2 path
        clearDB - whether to delete the database

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseDriver
        Returns a connection to the database. Database drivers are expected to fully connect at instantiation (i.e. in the constructor).
        Specified by:
        getConnection in interface DatabaseDriver
        Returns:
        the connection to the database, as specified in the DatabaseDriver constructor

      • isSupportExternalFunction

        public boolean isSupportExternalFunction()
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseDriver
        Returns whether the underline database supports external java functions. Distinguish from H2 Java External Function Support, which is very special.
        Specified by:
        isSupportExternalFunction in interface DatabaseDriver
        Returns:
        true if support H2 in memory java method, false if not support

      • createHashIndex

        public String createHashIndex(String index_name,
                              String table_name,
                              String column_name)
        Create a full length hash index on the given column@table using the index_name. For more information see: http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/en/create-index.html
